item.title: Adidas' fourth-quarter sales top expectations as final Yeezy stock sold off
item.description: Adidas on Wednesday reported an uptick in fourth-quarter sales that exceeded expectations, as the retailer sold off its last remaining Yeezy stock.

item.title: CrowdStrike shares tumble on light guidance. Here's why we're upgrading the stock anyways
item.description: The cybersecurity provider's outlook may contain a level of conservatism.

item.title: CrowdStrike falls 9% on disappointing earnings forecast
item.description: CrowdStrike shares dropped more than 9% in extended trading after the cybersecurity software provider issued weaker-than-expected guidance.

item.title: Okta pops more than 24% on strong earnings and guidance beat, posts best day in more than two years
item.description: Okta shares soared on Tuesday after the identity and access management company delivered strong fourth-quarter earnings and beat on guidance.

item.title: Best Buy shares plunge as CEO warns price increases are 'highly likely' due to Trump tariffs
item.description: Best Buy beat Wall Street's fourth-quarter earnings and revenue estimates as the company's computing and phone sales increased.
